wikitext.*:
'''Warden of [[Westmarch]]''' was a title granted by [[Thain]] [[Peregrin Took|Peregrin I]], to [[Fastred of Greenholm]] in {{SR|1462}}. This was done at the request of Fastred's father-in-law, [[Samwise Gamgee]], who was the [[Mayor of Michel Delving]].<ref>{{App|Later}}</ref>

The title was hereditary, passed by Fastred to his son [[Elfstan Fairbairn]], and associated from then on with the [[Fairbairn Family|Fairbairns of the Towers]]. They held the heirloom of the [[Red Book of Westmarch|Red Book]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>

It is unknown if the Warden was just a title, or also had any offices of responsibilities.
